levelList.name: Skullbuster
levelList.desc:
[BeforeUse] If [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] are both at 15+, activate 'Serious Skullbuster' instead
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At max SP, Coin Power +1
- [EndSkill] If this effect activated, lose 15 SP

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst]/3)% of each unit's max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] - 10) SP (min 0)

levelList.name: Skullbuster
levelList.desc:
[BeforeUse] If [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] are both at 15+, activate 'Serious Skullbuster' instead
If this unit's Speed <style="highlight">is faster than the target's</style>, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At max SP, <style="highlight">Clash Power +2</style> and Coin Power +1
- [EndSkill] If this effect activated, lose 15 SP

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst]/<style="highlight">2</style>)% of each unit's max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] - 10) SP (min 0)<style="highlight"></style>

[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 2 [RedEyeFirst] (once per turn)
<style="highlight">- At less than 7 [RedEyeFirst], gain +1 additional [RedEyeFirst]</style>

[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 2 [PenanceFirst] (once per turn)
<style="highlight">- At less than 7 [PenanceFirst], gain +1 additional [PenanceFirst]</style>

levelList.name: Serious Skullbuster
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume all [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] on self
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 [RedEyeFirst] consumed (max 4)
- Base Power +1 for every 5 [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 4)
[EndSkill] Lose 15 SP and gain [Emptiness] next turn

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Laceration] equal to ([RedEyeFirst] consumed - 15) on target (max 5)
Deal +2.5% more damage for every [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 100%)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by ([PenanceFirst] consumed / 2)% of each unit's max HP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] consumed - 10) SP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Binding] and 2 [Reduction] next turn (once per turn)

levelList.name: Serious Skullbuster
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume all [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] on self
- Coin Power +1 for every 5 [RedEyeFirst] consumed (max 4)
- Base Power +1 for every 5 [PenanceFirst] consumed (max 4)
[EndSkill] Lose 15 SP and gain [Emptiness] next turn

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Laceration] equal to ([RedEyeFirst] consumed - 15) on target (max 5)<style="highlight"></style>
Deal <style="highlight">+4%</style> more damage for every [RedEyeFirst] and [PenanceFirst] consumed (max <style="highlight">160%</style>)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by <style="highlight">([PenanceFirst] consumed)%</style> of each unit's max HP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ([PenanceFirst] consumed - <style="highlight">5</style>) SP
- Heal 1 additional ally for every 2 highest Reson. (max 2 more allies)
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Binding] and 2 [Reduction] next turn (once per turn)<style="highlight"></style>
